title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 27.11 - Participation of patients in teaching activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 27.11 - Participation of patients in teaching activities

State Regulations

Each patient has the right to refuse participation in any
staff training activity which is not an integral part of that patient's
individual service plan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
27.11

Amended, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 22, effective
6/4/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
